title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project lacks default folder
description: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP, the Import Project feature should provide a default folder in the file dialog.
OB: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, I get a dialog that does not have a good default folder. It shows me the desktop, my computer, etc... If none, it could point to the default content location.
EB: When importing an existing Eclipse project, I expect the Import Project feature to include a suitable default folder in the file dialog. This default folder should ideally point to the default content location.
SR:
1. Open Eclipse on a Windows XP system.
2. Navigate to the Import Project feature.
3. Click the 'Browse' button to select an existing project to import.Observe that the file dialog should display a default folder that is relevant to the Eclipse project, such as the default content location.
